u-workflow/legend.description: Legend. The style in the legend item is consistent with that of the graph node

u-workflow-item/target.description: (native attribute). For example, setting `_blank` will open a new blank page.

u-workflow-item/to.description: Requires vue-router, which is the same as the `to` attribute of `<router-link>`. It can be a string or an object describing the target location.

u-workflow-item/replace.description: Requires vue-router, which is the same as the `replace` attribute of `<router-link>`. If `true`, when clicked, `router.replace()` will be called instead of `router.push ()`, so no `history` record will be left after navigation.

u-workflow-item/append.description: Requires vue-router, which is the same as the `append` attribute of `<router-link>`. If it is `true`, the path of `to` will be appended after the current path.
